https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6U9CYtHRzEccoJSKCdyN2xUMr7E.jpg As Emma works to create a beautiful Christmas for the children she is looking after, the warm glow of the Christmas tree and the sparkling of the ornaments are in stark contrast with the hostility of the children in their freezing house.
